title: Bug 4974: Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When pressing the 'Ok' button, an error message is displayed: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. This error occurs because setting the output location and classpath are treated as separate operations. Setting the output location first creates an illegal state.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the application
2. Navigate to the settings menu
3. Set a new output location
4. Set the classpath
5. Press the 'Ok' button
